text: hi guys I've got a really exciting
announcement to share with you today now
if you've been following me for a long
time most of you know that for as long
as I can remember and really the reason
why I started this YouTube channel to
begin with was because I wanted to write
a cookbook and I never thought I could
do it it took a long time it took a lot
of courage I suppose and a lot of it
came from you so many of you for years
have been asking for a cookbook and it
just wasn't the right time until not too
long ago when I decided to really go
ahead and go for it and I started to
write my own cookbook and if you do
follow me on social media I don't know
why you don't if you don't because you
definitely should a lot of fun stuff
happens on there then you know that a
couple weeks ago I asked for your help
in deciding the cover of the book it was
incredibly important to me to have your
feedback and really your choice as to
what the cover should be because of what
I want you to know is that this cookbook
is as much yours as it is mine because
all of this really is possible thanks to
your love and support over the years so
without further ado drumroll this is it
we chose the cover with my face on it
because this is the cover that everyone
voted for which was incredible I think
it was like record-breaking comment
section about how many of you voted for
this cover and it's so I'm just so in
love with it it just really represents
me it's really simple it's just a food
in here is delicious and what you must
know is that this does not contain all
of the recipes from lowering the kitchen
in fact most of the recipes in this book
or exclusive to the book but there are a
few lower in the kitchen classics thrown
in there for you because I just couldn't
do it I needed some of those classics in
this book and I am just incredibly
excited for it to be out now the release
date is in September but you can
pre-order your copy now and if you do if
you pre-order your copy now again if you
follow me on social media you've heard
me talk about this but I wanted to do
something special for pre-orders so if
you do pre-order yours now you will get
and
autographed book plate that I will hand
right now for the photograph autograph
myself and so make sure there will be a
lot of links down below there will be a
lot of information down below as to
where you can purchase the book and also
the form you need to fill out in order
to receive an autographed book plate but
if you have already pre-ordered the book
and I know a lot of you have I talked to
you on Twitter all the time and
Instagram make sure you just take your
order number and fill out the form down
below and you will of course receive an
autographed book plate as well I would
never want to leave you out of course I
appreciate your love and support so very
much do you guys mean the world to me
and without you this would never have
happened and I'm just beyond thrilled
and honored to be able to share this
with you and I'm even more honored that
you chose the cover this really is now
the Laura in the kitchen cookbook it's
not the Laura Vitale cookbook it is the
Laura in the kitchen because this
kitchen you guys I could cry talking
about it but you're really hard the
heart my kitchen so I'm gonna hold
myself together all the links everything
will be down below thank you so much for
watching I appreciate all your support
go ahead and pre-order your copy I'm
gonna get my wrists ready for the
signing thank you guys so much for
watching go get it it's all good
